plugins.name: PageLocker
plugins.description:
PageLocker: Secure Your Figma Pages with Ease


PageLocker is a Figma plugin designed to give designers full control over page visibility.


🔑 Key Features:

• Lock Pages Securely: Hide page content while keeping it accessible to designated users with editing rights to copy files to edit.

• Custom Alerts: Automatically display clear, customizable alerts for locked pages, ensuring viewers know access is restricted.

• User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive controls for locking, unlocking, and enabling selective access in just a few clicks.


⚙️ How to Use:

1. Open PageLocker: Launch the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Lock Page: Securely hide all layers with one click. A customizable “Locked Alert” message is displayed to guide viewers.

3. Edit Design: Use the Editing Mode to duplicate layers onto a secure page, edit them freely, and then copy the updates back to the locked page. For added security, you can export the layers to a new Figma file for private editing. Alternatively, open the specific layer you want to edit in “🔧 Edit Mode.” Once finished, copy and replace it in the locked file, and then delete the “🔧 Edit Mode” file.

4. Unlock Page: Fully restore access and visibility for all users when you’re ready to share.
plugins.tagline: Securely lock pages for controlled public sharing.

For added security, you can export the layers to a new Figma file for private editing. Alternatively, open the specific layer you want to edit in “🔧 Edit Mode.” Once finished, copy and replace it in the locked file, and then delete the “🔧 Edit Mode” file.

4. Unlock Page: Fully restore access and visibility for all users when you’re ready to share.
118201.release_notes:
• Now properly handles the 3-page limit for Starter plan users.
• Updated the plugin to comply with Figma’s new page creation restrictions.
118201.tagline: Securely lock pages for controlled public sharing.

plugins.name: Radial & Angular Blur FX
plugins.description:
Radial & Spin Blur is a professional Figma plugin that lets you add cinematic zoom or spin blurs in seconds while keeping full creative control.


Radial Blur (Zoom). Simulates rushing toward/away from a point (motion graphics, depth focus).

Spin Blur (Angular). Rotates pixels around a center (energetic, surreal visuals).

Anaglyph 3D (optional). Adds subtle red/cyan offset (retro depth accents).


Key features

  1. Live Preview – Resizable preview area shows the effect before you commit.
  2. 5 × 5 Focal-Point Grid – Pick any corner, edge, or true center.
  3. Smooth Intensity Slider – From whisper-soft haze to dramatic streaks.
  4. Large-Image Support – Works on layers / frames up to 1000 px with smart scaling.
  5. No Clipping – Padding logic prevents cut-offs even at high values or off-center points.
  6. One-Click Apply – Happy with the look? Hit Apply and you’re done.
  7. Modern UI – Fast, accessible, dark-mode aware.
  8. Usage Analytics – Pseudonymous event data is sent to Amplitude to improve performance and roadmap decisions (no personal identifiers are collected).


Typical workflow

  1. Select a layer or frame (≤ 1000 px).
  2. Pick Radial (Zoom) or Spin (Angular).
  3. Set the center on the 5×5 grid and adjust intensity.
  4. Preview the result live.
  5. Apply the blur — undo-friendly and non-destructive.


Perfect for

UI/UX designers, illustrators, social-media creators, or anyone who wants studio-grade motion blurs inside Figma.


Built with TypeScript, Figma Plugin API, and Amplitude telemetry for anonymous usage insights.


Help

Tweet/X me @antongridz for feedback and help.

accepted.name: Anton Gridz
accepted.description: I'm a product designer with 13+ years of experience building tools for startups and growing teams.

plugins.tagline: Zoom- or spin-style blur with live preview, 5×5 focal grid, anaglyph toggle, and one-click apply.

plugins.name: WN Helper v1.0 [Release version]
plugins.description:
ATTENTION! This plugin was created for sharing by me and my friends in our special projects. Some of the functions do not work in other documents due to the different organization of layers and components.


Public functions that may be of interest to you:


- Quick creation of frames for creating multiple variants of social network avatars (500x500 size).


- Export the content of any frame to an image for

instant fill insertion for any selected element. (Very useful for copying any frame and pasting it as a background for any of your designs).


- Fast loading of any number of selected elements as PNG images. (Allows you to export individual items to different customer folders faster).


- Changing the background color of the work page (This is convenient for checking the most contrasting background of my work, but this function is already built into Figma by default)


--------------------------------------------------------


My personal functions working in a special project:


- Quick placement of texts with time units (conjugation of words)


- Checking my project (components) for the presence of prohibited (bad) words for search engines


- Quick selection of elements in my components


- Changing the size of texts to fit the required width and height of the element.


- Change component options in a couple of clicks


- Several options for importing and exporting texts to my components.


- Export and import the contents of my components to a CSV file.


- Import and export images and icons to my components.


- Moving and reversing the order of components in my frames.


- Change the colors of the elements.


--------------------------------------------------------


The project has localization in English and Russian, the ability to sort functions for the tasks of the working day and the type of customers, a settings section that helps manage the work of the plugin.


--------------------------------------------------------


Figma is a moderator, I have already submitted this plugin three times for moderation and I hope that I have fixed all its shortcomings.


I added a contact email in the text of this description, in the mail section in the application and also indicated the contact me button in the plugin itself. I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.

I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.
42499.release_notes: Speeding up the script, solving errors with a lack of data, a couple of new text insertion functions

plugins.name: Markdown to Sticker
plugins.description:
Markdown to Sticker

Transform your markdown text into beautifully organized FigJam stickers with just a few clicks. This plugin helps you quickly convert text notes into visual elements for your FigJam boards, perfect for brainstorming sessions, planning meetings, and collaborative workshops.


Key Features:

  1. Convert markdown text to FigJam stickers
  2. Customize colors, shapes, and opacity
  3. Automatic color-coding for task-related keywords
  4. Organized grid layout
  5. Simple validation


How to Use:

  1. Enter your markdown text in the editor.
  2. Each line starting with "-" creates a new sticker.
  3. Add customization options with indented lines starting with "".
  4. Click "Validate" to check your syntax.
  5. Click "Import" to create your stickers in FigJam.


Customization Options:

  1. color: red, green, blue, yellow, purple, orange, pink, gray, black
  2. wide: true/false (rectangular or square shape)
  3. opacity: 0.0-1.0 (transparency level)
  4. authorVisible: true/false (show author name)


Streamline your FigJam workflow by quickly converting text notes into visually organized stickers. Perfect for teams who prepare content in text format and want to seamlessly bring it into their visual collaboration space.
plugins.tagline: Convert markdown text into customizable FigJam stickers with simple formatting options

plugins.name: File Organizer
plugins.description:
🚀 Streamlined Organization:

Tired of manually creating pages for different project types? Say goodbye to the hassle! File Organizer automates the process, categorizing your Figma files into dedicated pages based on project types such as Sprint files and Design system files.


🎨 Tailored for Designers:

Created by designers, for designers, this plugin understands the unique needs of creative professionals. It not only simplifies file organization but also enhances collaboration by providing an intuitive structure that resonates with design workflows.


🌐 Universal Compatibility:

Whether you're a solo designer or part of a collaborative team, File Organizer seamlessly integrates into your Figma environment. Compatible with a wide range of project scales and complexities, this plugin adapts to your unique needs, ensuring a frictionless experience for all users.


📈 Boost Productivity:

By automating the task of file organization, File Organizer empowers you to focus on what you do best – designing! Spend less time navigating through cluttered files and more time bringing your creative visions to life.


🚨 Easy to Use:

No steep learning curves here! File Organizer boasts a user-friendly interface, making it accessible to both Figma beginners and seasoned professionals. With just a few clicks, watch as your Figma workspace transforms into a well-organized haven.


🌟 Elevate Collaboration:

Enhance collaboration within your team by ensuring everyone is on the same page—literally! With File Organizer, project-specific files are consolidated, fostering a collaborative environment where communication and creativity can thrive.


🔗 How to Get Started:

Install File Organizer from the Figma Community.

Select the files you want to organize.

Run the plugin and let the magic happen!


Take the leap into a more organized and efficient Figma experience with File Organizer. Install now and watch as your design process becomes a breeze!
plugins.tagline: Organize Pages by Context or AI, and Auto-Fill Placeholders with AI

plugins.name: Sparkle Design Theme Settings
plugins.description:
Sparkle Designに興味はあるけど、自分のプロジェクトに合うだろうか...そんな不安を抱えていませんか？

Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの利用者が更にいいデザインを生み出すことをサポートするプラグインです。


Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの高い品質を維持しながらも複雑なVariablesの編集や面倒なドキュメントの更新を自動で実行するため、Sparkle Designを簡単に任意のスタイルにカスタマイズできます。


現在は以下の3つのテーマのカスタマイズに対応しています。


Primary Color

プライマリカラーを好みの色に設定できます。グレーもプライマリカラーを反映した配色が自動で反映されるため、UI全体のトーンを維持しながらのカスタマイズが可能です！


Font Family

monospaceとproportionalのそれぞれのフォントファミリーを設定できます。対応フォントはすべてGoogle Fontsに収録されているため、開発時もスムーズな連携が可能です。


Border Radius

角丸のサイズを設定できます。UIの要素ごとに異なるサイズの角丸がすべて同期的に変化するため、それぞれの角丸が持つ意味を残しながらもUIの印象を変更できます。


※ Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Design専用のプラグインです。Sparkle Design上でご利用ください。


Sparkle Designについて

  1. https://sparkle-design.goodpatch.com/
  2. Sparkle Design for Figma


グッドパッチについて

グッドパッチは顧客体験を起点に企業変革を前進させるデザインカンパニーです。

https://goodpatch.com/

accepted.name: Sparkle Design
accepted.description: グッドパッチのナレッジを集約。誰もがいいデザインを生み出せるグッドパッチのデザインシステム「Sparkle Design」です。

plugins.tagline: Sparkle Designのテーマ編集ツール

plugins.name: MATE
plugins.description:
Automate boring tasks

Tell MATE to rename variables with real smartness, apply random opacity for selected items, pick 3 items from the selection, etc, etc. MATE supports you in your daily, time-consuming tasks.


Your own little tools

With MATE you can create your own little tools that are not available as plugins.


Generative (randomized) Design

Generative is all about mass editing and randomizing hundreds of elements. Impossible to do manually, easy with MATE.


Scripts

Save responses from MATE as scripts and run them any time - without roundtrip to the AI.


Support and feedback:

Email: support@omata.io

Web: www.omata.io/mate-figma


Follow for more:

https://twitter.com/plugisto

accepted.name: Plugisto
accepted.description: Developing tools for designers. Creator of Adobe plugins Omata (@omata_design), Arranger, Xray and Delaunoi.

plugins.tagline: Let Al do the boring tasks for you. You focus on the fun stuff.

plugins.name: DATAtoTable
plugins.description:
Data to Table


Data to Table Plugin is designed to streamline the workflow of designers and developers by allowing them to visualize and analyze JSON and XML data directly within the Figma interface.


With this plugin, you can easily convert structured data into organized tables,


making it convenient for front-end (F) and back-end (B) developers to collaborate effectively on projects.


and back-end (B) developers to analyze and work with data directly within Figma.



Key Features


Data Visualization

  1. Input your JSON or XML data, and the plugin will generate a structured table within Figma, providing a visual representation of your data.
  2. Child Objects are created in a separate table positioned at the bottom right of their parent Object.
  3. This allows for an intuitive representation of nested data structures.
  4. Sibling Objects are created at the same depth, visually representing data structures at the same hierarchical level.
  5. This makes it easy for designers to incorporate data-driven elements into their designs.


Data Analysis

  1. Developers (B-E) can utilize the generated tables to analyze and understand the underlying data structure.
  2. This feature simplifies the process of extracting key information from complex data sets.


Source Data View

  1. Clicking on the generated table allows you to access the raw source data directly within Figma.
  2. This makes it effortless for developers to inspect and work with JSON, XML, and other data formats, enhancing collaboration between design and development teams.


How It Works


  1. Input JSON or XML Data
  2. Click the "Generate Table" button
  3. Click the table and use the "View Data" button



Collaboration Made Easy


Data to Table Plugin bridges the gap between design and development by providing a seamless way to visualize, analyze, and work with data.


It empowers designers to incorporate real data into their designs and enables developers to gain insights from the design files.


This collaborative approach enhances the overall project workflow and communication between design and development teams.
plugins.tagline: JSON,XML to Table Frame

101263.name: DATAtoTable
101263.description:
Data to Table


Data to Table Plugin is designed to streamline the workflow of designers and developers by allowing them to visualize and analyze JSON and XML data directly within the Figma interface.


With this plugin, you can easily convert structured data into organized tables,


making it convenient for front-end (F) and back-end (B) developers to collaborate effectively on projects.


and back-end (B) developers to analyze and work with data directly within Figma.



Key Features


Data Visualization

  1. Input your JSON or XML data, and the plugin will generate a structured table within Figma, providing a visual representation of your data.
  2. Child Objects are created in a separate table positioned at the bottom right of their parent Object.
  3. This allows for an intuitive representation of nested data structures.
  4. Sibling Objects are created at the same depth, visually representing data structures at the same hierarchical level.
  5. This makes it easy for designers to incorporate data-driven elements into their designs.


Data Analysis

  1. Developers (B-E) can utilize the generated tables to analyze and understand the underlying data structure.
  2. This feature simplifies the process of extracting key information from complex data sets.


Source Data View

  1. Clicking on the generated table allows you to access the raw source data directly within Figma.
  2. This makes it effortless for developers to inspect and work with JSON, XML, and other data formats, enhancing collaboration between design and development teams.


How It Works


  1. Input JSON or XML Data
  2. Click the "Generate Table" button
  3. Click the table and use the "View Data" button



Collaboration Made Easy


Data to Table Plugin bridges the gap between design and development by providing a seamless way to visualize, analyze, and work with data.


It empowers designers to incorporate real data into their designs and enables developers to gain insights from the design files.


This collaborative approach enhances the overall project workflow and communication between design and development teams.
101263.release_notes: fix issue : only Table Name DDL Schema case

plugins.name: Generative Art Workbench
plugins.description:
Generative Art Workbench is a helpful Figma plugin that simplifies the process of testing and previewing different layer combinations for your generative art projects.


With an intuitive frame naming convention, this plugin allows you to thoroughly experiment with various layers and efficiently generate composite previews inside Figma itself.


By providing a practical solution within Figma's environment, the plugin highly streamlines your workflow and empowers you to quickly achieve the desired results in your generative/derivative style art.


Open sourced on Github
plugins.tagline: A tool to aid in testing generative art being developed through Figma.

plugins.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
plugins.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text
plugins.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

126847.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
126847.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to all domains to fetch placeholder images and lorem ipsum text from various sources.

126847.release_notes:
Key Features (Excerpt for Release Notes)
Dynamic Word Count Matching: "Smart Lorem Ipsum" counts the number of words in each text layer within a frame (excluding punctuation) and generates Lorem Ipsum text with the exact same word count. For example, if a text layer contains "Hi, Jonathan" (2 words), it will be replaced with "Lorem ipsum" (2 words).
Seamless Integration: All text layers within a frame are automatically detected and updated with a single click.
126847.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

plugins.name: Powerset
plugins.description:
Powerset renders all permutations of a selected instance based on the values of its variant properties. The created combinations can help you QA your component library definitions, or showcase its permutations.


Supports Instance Properties, Layer Visibility Properties and even Exposed Instances!!


Instructions

  1. Select an instance of any component
  2. Toggle the checkboxes on the generated properties table for the desired properties’ values
  3. Note the total variations that will be created based on your selections
  4. Push Create.


Tips

  • FrameName – A new frame is created with name 'Powerset/$LayerName'. This will be updated for the same instance every time the plugin is run. Any changes to the auto-layout properties of this frame will be maintained on each run.
  • Lock Toggle – Every time you select an instance, this plugin will regenerate its properties’ table. Toggle the lock icon to lock the properties table on the selected instance.
plugins.tagline: Create all permutations of your components. Use them to Analyse, Document and QA your components.

  • Lock Toggle – Every time you select an instance, this plugin will regenerate its properties’ table. Toggle the lock icon to lock the properties table on the selected instance.
78106.tagline: Create all permutations of your components. Use them to Analyse, Document and QA your components.

plugins.description: Focus Map is a plugin that visualizes the areas of focus within selected objects in your Figma projects. This tool is especially useful for analyzing which parts of a design are drawing the most attention. This allows designers to quickly identify focal points and make more informed adjustments to their projects.

plugins.name: HIVO
plugins.description:
HIVO is a digital asset management platform that is on a mission to unite technology, teams and data across multiple businesses to all work together in a collaborative and secure cloud environment.


Thousands of brand managers, creatives, IT professionals, developers, engineers and marketers use HIVO every day to create, review, download, approve, share and store digital content. HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Whether you're sharing content with external agencies, creating a video for social media, writing the brief for a press release, viewing a branded style guide, reviewing a website mockup, requesting approval from a colleague, or starting an automated marketing campaign - it can all be done within the one platform, HIVO.


HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Teams that use HIVO:

  • Improve communication amongst your team and partners;
  • Unlock user collaborations and transparency;
  • Build better emotional connections with customers, partners and stakeholders;
  • Increase the volume and improve the quality of visual communications;
  • Achieve end-to-end brand consistency across all marketing channels and regions;
  • Achieve cost savings on ownership of digital assets; and
  • Capture data and report on user activity and digital asset use.
plugins.tagline: HIVO is a digital asset management (DAM) platform in a secured cloud environment.

Enjoy,

Banyu Rachman

plugins.name: All Relevant Infos, Please
plugins.description:
A fairly simple plugin that shows you All Relevant Infos when you're in dev mode. Having only view access to a file hides some important information on layers, like e. g. min and max width or the actual Auto Layout gap. When using this plugin, you see these infos in the right sidebar, grouped by categories.


Note: This is currently in Beta and only supports Frame, Auto Layout, Constraints, and basic Typography properties. Let me know what other properties you would like to have displayed.
plugins.tagline: View min and max width, shadows, and other hidden properties

plugins.name: PSD Importer for Figma
plugins.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.
plugins.tagline: Easily import your PSD files in just a few clicks.

133175.name: PSD Importer for Figma
133175.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.

plugins.name: Rename Today
plugins.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
plugins.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

67189.name: Rename Today
67189.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
67189.release_notes:
Rename Today - Version 2.0 Release Notes

1. Enhanced Date Selection - Introduced a new date picker that allows users to select any date for renaming frames, not just today's date.
2. Redesigned UI - Updated the user interface with a cleaner and more modern design, improving user experience.
3. Localized Button Label - Depending on the region, the button label changes to provide a more localized feel.
4. Bug Fixes - Addressed issues from the previous version to ensure smoother performance.
67189.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

plugins.name: Frame Duplicator
plugins.description:
Duplicate the selected frame into any number of new sizes, perfect for creating large quantities of display ads and similar tasks.


Here's how:

Prepare your design using Figma's built-in Auto Layout properties or Constraints settings for scaling.


For example:

JBL-Summer-200x300

JBL-Summer-1200x400


Provide a list of sizes, separated by line breaks. You can include additional text in each line, which will be used to name the frames.


The plugin creates duplicates of the master frame in your specified sizes and adjusts the elements according to the settings, scaling, resizing, and repositioning as necessary.

accepted.name: DigiComm
accepted.description:
Web Design Agency
Design ✶ Animation ✦ Development

plugins.tagline: Duplicate and resize from list input

plugins.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! 🎉


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
plugins.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

109171.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
109171.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! 🎉


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
109171.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Image EffectSync
plugins.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
plugins.tagline: Copy adjusments from image

121283.name: Image EffectSync
121283.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
121283.release_notes:
This update addresses user feedback on image pasting. A new checkbox has been added to give users more control over the scalemode value:

Default: The scalemode remains unchanged when pasting.
Uncheck: The scalemode will be adjusted to match the new image.
This simple option allows users to customize their experience and streamline their workflow.

133162.description:
This plugin helps convert your Read.cv profile into a Figma Design file which can be easily copied and pasted into Figma Sites as a functional resume website.


Start by grabbing a template file.


Made with 🩶 & ✨

Alex
133162.tagline: Turn your Read.cv profile into a website

plugins.name: Table of Contents - An Index Page Generator
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to redundant index page creation and hello to effortless organization with Table of Contents Figma Plugin - An Index Page Generator


  1. This plugin will help you quickly generate a basic Table of Contents (ToC) for your design files, making it easier for you to style and team and stakeholders to navigate project density.
  2. Page Creation happens with a click on "Generate." A new page with a Table of Contents will be added to your Figma file, organizing your design for easy reference.
  3. Hierarchical Indexing supports both top-level items and nested sub-items, preserving the structure of the sections and frames you select.
  4. Using the plugin get the redundant work out of the way.


This plugin is perfect for anyone working on complex projects with multiple frames and sections. Whether you’re working solo or in a collaborative environment, it helps bring clarity to your design files, making them more accessible and (hopefully 🤞) understandable for everyone involved.


This plugin is part of a series focused on elevating the little things we designers need! It’s also a way of giving back to the design community. xOxO

accepted.name: Mina Awadallah
accepted.description: A designer with a simple purpose!

plugins.tagline: Easily generate Table of contents / Index however you name it!

plugins.name: Crop It

plugins.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
plugins.description:
This plugin help designing user interface where the entire screen darkens, and another component (e.g. dialog) overlays on top.


Select a frame and run the plugin. All objects in the frame will be grouped as a locked frame named 'BASE'. A locked rectangle named 'SCRIM' will be added to the frame.


If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
plugins.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

66727.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
66727.description:

If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
66727.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

plugins.name: Figma to Frappe Builder
plugins.description:
You can simply select the frames you want to copy and click on the "Copy Frame" button. The plugin will copy the converted frames to the clipboard. You can then paste the copied frames in the Frappe Builder.


Notes


- The plugin is currently in development and may have some issues.

- Only frames using auto-layout are expected to work correctly at this time.

- It is recommended to copy small sections of a page rather than the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Plugin to copy frames from Figma to Frappe Builder

117940.name: Figma to Frappe Builder
117940.description:
You can simply select the frames you want to copy and click on the "Copy Frame" button. The plugin will copy the converted frames to the clipboard. You can then paste the copied frames in the Frappe Builder.


Notes


- The plugin is currently in development and may have some issues.

- Only frames using auto-layout are expected to work correctly at this time.

- It is recommended to copy small sections of a page rather than the entire page.
117940.release_notes:
- Fixed standard style mapping
- Auto set relative width even if auto-layout is disabled
- Fix child positioning
117940.tagline: Plugin to copy frames from Figma to Frappe Builder

plugins.name: Copy Properties

plugins.name: Data Table Builder Pro
plugins.description:
Data Table Builder Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you quickly create, customize, and save reusable table designs.


Build Data Tables Fast

Add multiple columns with different data types (text, number, boolean, ratings, labels, avatars, and more) so you can shape your table exactly how you need it.


Visual Table Builder

Edit columns in a live preview with inline editing. Easily tweak styling, spacing, borders, and more.


Theming & Auto-layout Controls

Choose from Shadcn themes and customize any element color to suit your brand or design and as row or column based auto layout.


CSV Import

Quickly populate large tables by importing CSV data. Perfect for teams handling data from spreadsheets.


Save & Reuse Templates

Save your tables—complete with styling and layout—to reuse next time. You can store unlimited custom templates and iterate on them over time.


Clearly Named Layers

Export your table into Figma file as ready-to-use auto-layout frames with easy to understand layer names.


Why Use Data Table Builder Pro?


Time-Saving

Create data-dense mockups fast without manually creating rows and columns.


Consistent Designs

Ensure your tables maintain a polished look across multiple projects thanks to reusable templates.


Flexible & Customizable

Tailor column types, theme colors, and layout directions to fit your exact needs.


Collaborative

Import real data from CSV for realistic scenarios or stakeholder presentations.


Give your data the presentation it deserves and level up your Figma projects with Table Templates Pro!


Free trial limitations:

  1. 3 table exports
  2. No saved tables

accepted.name: Superbig
accepted.description: 👋 Hey there! My name is Chris and I'm a product designer who the builds plugins I want to use.

plugins.tagline: Create, customize, and save reusable data tables with CSV data or easy to edit templates.

plugins.name: Mock Builder
plugins.description:
This is a beta release, and may contain minor bugs. Please report any bugs or feature requests to GitHub.


Mock Builder fills a large gap that other fake-data plugins have. Many plugins give you the option for inserting just one data type, which means that doing things like 'Lastname, Firstname' in the same text node impossible. Another example is one plugin may format phone numbers one way, or may output multiple types of formats. Neither of these may work how you want.


Mock Builder allows you to format your data how you want, using multiple types of dynamic fake data in the same text node along with static text.


Mock Builder data uses the falso.js library under the hood.
plugins.tagline: Quickly Build Fake Data, Endless Combinations

networkAccess.reasoning: Mock Builder requires an external script for retrieving fake data.
